mapper.sql: t1.id, t1.user_name, t1.user_key, t1.user_code, t1.user_status, t1.user_phone, t1.user_photo, t1.role_id, t1.role_type_id, t1.department_id, t1.login_time, t1.create_time, t1.create_person, t1.modify_person, t1.modify_time, t1.del_time, t1.del_person, t1.remark,t1.region_id
mapper.select: select ,t1.user_password, t2.type_name AS role_type_name,t3.role_name from car_manager_user t1 inner join car_manager_role_type t2 on t1.role_type_id=t2.id inner join car_manager_role t3 on t1.role_id=t3.id where t1.id = #{id}

SELECT ,t1.user_password, t2.type_name AS role_type_name,t3.role_name from car_manager_user t1 inner join car_manager_role_type t2 on t1.role_type_id=t2.id inner join car_manager_role t3 on t1.role_id=t3.id where t1.user_key=#{userKey} and t1.user_status <> '3'
select t1.id,t1.user_name AS `name` from car_manager_user t1 where t1.user_status='1' and t1.department_id=#{departmentId}
